tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_countries CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_countries AS SELECT afp.id AS pledge_id, v.country_name, COALESCE(v.country_id, -999999999) AS country_id, percentage, COALESCE(v.cnt_nulls, 0) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges afp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ra.pledge_id, loc.country_name, loc.country_id, sum(ra.location_percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(ra.location_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges_location ra JOIN ni_all_locations_with_levels loc on loc.acvl_id = ra.location_id GROUP BY ra.pledge_id, loc.country_id, loc.country_name ) v ON afp.id = v.pledge_id;
